Japanese:
そうだろうなー!
で!なにがとくいなんだ?
 やきゅう フェンシング<*A>
English:
I knew it! So what sport are you good at?
<0>Baseball<0>Fencing<*A>

Japanese:
そうだったのか!オレは
オマエのことかんちがいしてた!<*2>
English: I had no idea! You've made me think differently about you! //<*2>

Japanese:
なぞなぞなら オレだって
とくいなんだぞ!おどろいた?<*2>
English: I'm quite good at riddles myself! Surprised, are you?<*2>

Japanese: いつもヘルメットかぶってるよな!オレもやってみたいな!<*2>
English: That's right, you're always wearing your helmet! I'd like to try and play baseball sometime too!<*2>

Japanese:
うそだ!ぜったいうそだろ!
だまされないぞオレは!<*2>
English: No way, I don't believe it! If you thought you could fool me, guess again! //<*2>

Japanese:
オレってはずかしがリやなのが
なやみ なんだよね
 きにすんなよ うそつけ<*A>
English:
I'm worried about being too shy... //
<0>Don't worry<0>Yeah right //<*A>

Japanese:
やっぱリきにしすぎかな?
 そうだよ なおすには..<*A>
English:
I guess I shouldn't be worrying over it? //
<0>That's right<0>Try to improve //<*A>

Japanese:
うそじゃないよ!オマエには
こんななやみはわからないよな!
 わるかった わかんない<*A>
English:
I'm not lying! You would NEVER understand the kind of worry I have... //
<0>I'm sorry<0>I wouldn't //<*A>

Japanese:
あリがとう!なんか
じしんがでてきたよ!<*2>
English: Thank you! That gives me a little bit more self-confidence!<*2>
